marklogic.body:
Can we see all the raw footage you shot before you edited it into the episode? Because it looks to me like she mostly just mixes Cold reading with repeating what people say back to them a bit later and then the first mention is edited out. She also seems to force lots of bogus hits by insisting people agree with her -- "Does that make sense to you?" Sure, we can Always find a way to make sense out of anything if someone pressures us into doing it.
Are her kids in on the gag? Or has she manipulated them too?
